topic.title: GuiControl
topic.p: SetFocus and GetFocus are renamed to SetFocused and GetFocused.

topic.title: GuiListControl
topic.p: Adding items could cause flashing during rendering for about 1 frame. To workaround this issue, call GuiControlHost::ForceCalculateSizeImmediately after finishing editing all items in a rendering cycle, in either C++ or Workflow. A control host is a top level window like window or menu. You could also call the same function in `ContainerComposition` of any list controls, but this function is only available to C++.

topic.title: GuiControlHost
topic.p: WindowReadyToClose event is added. WindowClosing is called first, and if it does not cancel the operation, WindowReadyToClose is close, then the window is close, then WindowClosed is called.

topic.title: GuiGraphicsComposition
topic.p:
Removed:
Margin property
IsTrivialComposition function
PreferredBounds property
Renamed:
ClientArea property to CachedClientArea property
MinPreferredMinSize property to CachedMinSize and CachedMinClientSize property
Bounds and PreviousCalculatedBounds property to CachedBounds property

topic.title: GuiGraphicsSite
topic.p: This class is removed, members are merged to its base class GuiGraphicsComposition.

topic.title: GuiBoundsComposition
topic.p: Bounds property is renamed to ExpectedBounds.
AlignmentToParent property will no longer consider parent's InternalMargin property in layout.

topic.title: GuiTableComposition
topic.p: When MinSizeLimitation is not LimitToElementAndChildren, layout of cells is not considered in the table's minimum size.
